title: Transcripts of repetitive DNA elements signal to block phagocytosis of hematopoietic stem cells | Science
content: Macrophages maintain hematopoietic stem cell (HSC) quality by assessing cell surface Calreticulin (Calr), an “eat-me” signal induced by reactive oxygen species (ROS). Using zebrafish genetics, we identified Beta-2-microglobulin (B2m) as a crucial “don’t ...
